update.description: [engine] Extends IAssetMediator to support getXml() and getObject() [engine] Support feathers.data.ListColletion and feathers.data.HierarchicalCollection [engine] Fixed that localization doesnâ€™t work on external layout [template] Support dataProvider property for feathers Components [template] Support more feathers components: ButtonGroup, SpinnerList and TabBar [template] Add batchable property to TextField [extensions] Reimplement ContainerButton
